structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Labour Force Subcategory Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of labour force subcategories including rates, percentages, specific reasons for inactivity, and demographic breakdowns for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: persons
structure:Code.common:Description: Count of individuals in absolute numbers.

structure:Code.common:Name: % aged 20-64
structure:Code.common:Description: Percentage of population aged 20 to 64 years.

structure:Code.common:Name: % aged 15+ (1981-97: 14+)
structure:Code.common:Description: Percentage of population aged 15 and over, with historical reference to 14+ for 1981-97 period.

structure:Code.common:Name: activity rate
structure:Code.common:Description: Labour force participation rate as percentage of working-age population.

structure:Code.common:Name: employment rate
structure:Code.common:Description: Employment rate as percentage of working-age population.

structure:Code.common:Name: unemployment rate
structure:Code.common:Description: Unemployment rate as percentage of labour force.

structure:Code.common:Name: Employed, not undermployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are employed and working their desired number of hours.

structure:Code.common:Name: Undermployed part-time workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Part-time workers who would prefer to work more hours.

structure:Code.common:Name: Seeking work but not immediately available
structure:Code.common:Description: Unemployed persons actively seeking work but not available to start immediately.

structure:Code.common:Name: Available to work but not seeking
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons available for work but not actively seeking employment.

structure:Code.common:Name: Education or training
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons due to participation in education or training programs.

structure:Code.common:Name: Own illness or disability
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons due to personal health conditions or disabilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Personal or family responsibilities
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons due to caregiving or other family obligations.

structure:Code.common:Name: Retirement
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons who have retired from the labour force.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other inactive
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons for reasons not covered by other categories.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other reasons
structure:Code.common:Description: Other reasons for inactivity not covered by specific categories.

structure:Code.common:Name: Persons aged 0-17
structure:Code.common:Description: Population aged 0 to 17 years, typically outside labour force.

structure:Code.common:Name: Persons aged 18-59
structure:Code.common:Description: Population aged 18 to 59 years, prime working age group.
